name: a Morte [15 maps - 3 Hubs]
description: Berlin, 1945. Things are heating up and Inside an old church a cabal of Nosferati begin opening portals, looking for another realm to evacuate to. Unfortunately for them they come across an arachnid-infested mausoleum, where a hero awakens... Extensive Hexen mod with 15 new maps, spread over 3 hubs. New weapons, Enemies and Environmental Hazards. More info on the zdoom forum: http://forum.zdoom.org/viewtopic.php?f=19&t=50891
